## Document Purpose

The point of this document is to check and verify that the PM~2.5~ smoke data that will be used in the multi-state time-series study.

```{r setup}
library(tidyverse) # data manipulation 
library(sf) # simple features geospatial package
library(ncdf4) # netCDF import
```

First step is to read in data.

```{r data import}
# read netcdf file
gwr_2015_nc <- nc_open("./data/smoke/GWRdata4health_West2015.nc")
```

Explore the netCDF file.

```{r netcdf}
print(gwr_2015_nc)

# get lon vals
lon <- ncvar_get(gwr_2015_nc, "glons")
nlon <- dim(lon)
# get lat vals
lat <- ncvar_get(gwr_2015_nc, "glats")
nlat <- dim(lat)
# get gwr PM2.5 values
gwr_pm <- ncvar_get(gwr_2015_nc, "gwrPM")
npm <- dim(gwr_pm)
# get date
dates <- ncvar_get(gwr_2015_nc, "dates")

# create dataframe
grid <- expand.grid(lon,lat)

```
